name: New Papers
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This prototype is UNFINISHED, and is public for the purposes of Unfinished Week. Made over a couple weeks while checking out Unity.

Feedback welcome via my Twitter @dashrava, or via the unfinished week comments section.

INFO:

You assume the role of a beginner newspaper salesman who wishes to build the best newspaper stand in town. Frantically sell papers as the rush hour hits, while fending off thieves and managing your money piles.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Click on Safe to stash money.

Click on telephone to order more papers.

Click on people to sell papers, do marketing, or shoo them away if they're stealing.
